'''Blacksmiths''' are shops that primarily sell [[Weapon]]s. They also allow for access to the [[Forging]] menu.

==Forging Locations==
* [[Schulz's Blacksmith]]
* [[Hanfeng's Ironmongers]]
* [[Amenoma Smithy]]
* [[Shamshir's Smithy]]

==Shops==
These shops offer Weapons of the [[1-Star Series|1-Star]] and [[2-Star Series]] and players can [[Forging|forge]] at these NPCs. Blacksmiths also offer the [[Mining Outcrop]] Search service with the most yields.
